name: AudioFileRegionList
desc: A list of the audio file regions in a file.

items.name: var mNumberRegions: UInt32
items.desc: The number of regions in the list specified in the mRegions parameter.

items.name: var mRegions: (AudioFileRegion)
items.desc: A variable length array of audio file regions.

items.name: var mSMPTE_TimeType: UInt32
items.desc: The SMPTE timing scheme used in the file. See Core Audioâ€™s CAFFile.h header file for the values used here. For more information, see Core Audio Overview.
